name: Marin Humane Society - Pet Care Assistance
description: Pet care assistance for low-income seniors, people living with HIV/AIDS, and hospice recipients; Pet Meals on Wheels
fullDescription: Marin Humane Society provides pet care assistance to help vulnerable Marin County residents keep and care for their pets.
whatTheyOffer:
- Pet Meals on Wheels (food delivery for homebound seniors)
- Financial assistance for veterinary care
- Pet food pantry
- Services for people living with HIV/AIDS
- Support for hospice recipients
howToGetIt:
1. Contact Marin Humane Society to inquire about assistance
2. Must be a Marin County resident
3. Explain your situation and needs
4. Provide documentation as required (age, income, medical status)
5. Receive assistance based on program eligibility
address: 171 Bel Marin Keys Blvd, Novato, CA 94949
